backend/main.mo: Main backend actor managing user tasks, profiles, daily content, and authorization-protected CRUD operations.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that passes through the actor state without changes.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global CSS defining light/dark theme tokens and resets.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, authentication guards, theming, and global app shell for the React application.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/DailyC: Carousel component fetching and displaying daily content with loading, empty, and error states.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/DailyO: Displays daily task tiles using fetched task data, showing completion states and summaries for each activity.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/DailyP: Renders a progress bar calculating percentage completion of six daily activities based on task data.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/DateSe: Provides a popover calendar button allowing users to pick a date and trigger updates.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Monthl: Generates an SVG line chart of daily percentage progress with axes, labels, and scrollable width.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppFooter: Displays footer with copyright text, heart icon, and a caffeine.ai referral link.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Shows authenticated header with theme toggle, user menu, navigation links, and logout option.
Wraps the app with header, routed main content, and footer layout structure.
frontend/src/components/reports/Download: Allows users to select a date range and download task data as a CSV via backend actor calls.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeProvi: Manages theme state (light, dark, system) with localStorage and exposes theme context/hooks.
frontend/src/components/tracking/Fasting: Lets users record fasting status and notes for a selected date, updating backend task data.
frontend/src/components/tracking/Murojaa: UI module for viewing and editing daily murojaah surah and verse range, saving updates via backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/tracking/Sedekah: Displays sedekah status and triggers backend update plus opening a payment link for donations.
frontend/src/components/tracking/SholatM: Manages toggle switches for daily prayer completion and saves state to backend on change.
frontend/src/components/tracking/Tahfidz: UI for entering and saving tahfidz surah and verse range, validating input and updating backend.
frontend/src/components/tracking/Tilawah: Handles tilawah surah and verse input fields and persists changes through backend updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches authenticated or anonymous backend actors and invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Provides authentication state, user role, admin status, and logout handling via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, tasks, and daily content through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, and logout helpers. Wraps AuthClient creation and manages login status flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes. Sets base typography, colors, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider. Loads global styles and renders the root App component.
Renders the admin panel with tabbed sections for users, content, statistics, and settings. Each tab loads its corresponding management component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/DailyContentTab: Allows admins to view, edit, and save daily content entries such as Quran reflections, hadith, and motivational quotes. Loads existing content, updates it, and provides a preview.
frontend/src/pages/admin/SettingsTab.tsx: Provides a form to view and update the global sedekah payment link, with loading and save states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/StatisticsTab.t: Shows user count and placeholder participation stats for a selected date range.
frontend/src/pages/admin/UserManagementT: Lists all users and provides a dialog to create new users using principal, name, and email.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays the userâ€™s daily dashboard with modules for various worship activities and initializes user profile setup. Manages date selection, profile form, and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Provides a login screen using useAuth, redirecting authenticated users and showing a loading state during login. Includes a styled card with login instructions and button.
frontend/src/pages/MonthlyProgressPage.t: Shows monthly progress charts by fetching tasks in a date range and computing daily and aggregate completion stats. Allows navigating between months and handles loading/error states.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Generates a CSV export of task data with headers and escaped values.
frontend/src/utils/date.ts: Provides timestamp conversion helpers and date formatting utilities.
frontend/src/utils/month.ts: Offers helpers for month boundaries, day lists, and Indonesian month labels.
frontend/src/utils/progress.ts: Computes overall task completion percentage based on six criteria.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Validates that a surah and verse range are correctly specified.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Contains the full project state for a Ramadhan tracking web app, including feature descriptions, architecture notes, known issues, and existing implemented features. Serves as the authoritative specification for current behavior, bugs, and requirements.
